name: Sir Vival (itch)
description:
Sir Vival is a 2D platformer designed to get you thinking and keep you frustrated.

Life is hard when you're a robotic knight in a magnetic world. Left is right, up is down!

Play as Sir Vival, and reach the exit. Simple!

Features:

15 jaw clenchingly frustrating levels

Aurally stimulating soundtrack composed by Mark Sparling

Once you reach a level, you can type in the name of the level (shown in the title bar) and hit enter to return to that level at any time!

Updates:

9/11/15 - Complete overhaul of server. Old versions will be incompatible.
